select b.id brandId,b.avator avatar,b.brand_name title from private_rel r left join brand b on r.friend_id=b.customer_id left join oasis_member m on m.oasis_id=#{dto.oasisId} and m.brand_id=b.id where 1=1
AND locate(#{dto.q}, b.brand_name)>0
and r.user_id=#{user_id} and m.brand_id is null order by r.modified_at desc limit 500
